Sentencas: For LaMnO3+delta with oxygen-excess nonstoichiometry, in situ X-ray diffractometry was performed under high temperatures and precisely controlled oxygen partial pressures, P-O2.
Titulo: In situ XRD study on oxygen-excess LaMnO3

Sentencas: A rhombohedral phase was observed under most experimental conditions.
Titulo: In situ XRD study on oxygen-excess LaMnO3

Sentencas: With temperature rising, the lattice volume increased linearly in a low temperature region; the coefficient of linear thermal expansion (CTE) was 1.06 x 10(-5) K-1.
Titulo: In situ XRD study on oxygen-excess LaMnO3

Sentencas: In a high temperature region, the temperature dependence of the lattice volume upwardly deviated from the linearity, indicating that the unit cell expanded upon decrease in excess oxygen.
Titulo: In situ XRD study on oxygen-excess LaMnO3

Sentencas: The nonstoichiometry coefficient of the linear isothermal expansion was calculated at 5 x 10(-2) using literature data on delta(T, P-O2).
Titulo: In situ XRD study on oxygen-excess LaMnO3

Sentencas: The rhombohedral distortion escalated with temperature and P-O2 decreasing.
Titulo: In situ XRD study on oxygen-excess LaMnO3

Sentencas: The dependence of cell volume and distortion on nonstoichiometry is well interpreted as the effect of variation in the ionic radius and tolerance factor.
Titulo: In situ XRD study on oxygen-excess LaMnO3
